statements: SELECT * FROM privacy_impact_assessments;
SELECT assessment_id, assess_date, data_subject FROM privacy_impact_assessments WHERE data_controller = 'Company X';
SELECT data_processor, data_categories FROM privacy_impact_assessments WHERE data_subject = 'Alice';
SELECT assessment_id, assess_date, data_controller, data_processor FROM privacy_impact_assessments ORDER BY assess_date DESC;
SELECT data_processing_purpose, risk_assessment FROM privacy_impact_assessments WHERE data_controller = 'Company Y';
SELECT assessment_id, assess_date, data_subject FROM privacy_impact_assessments WHERE data_controller='Company A';
SELECT * FROM privacy_impact_assessments WHERE assess_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY assess_date DESC;
SELECT data_processing_purpose, data_categories FROM privacy_impact_assessments WHERE data_subject='John Doe' AND data_controller='Company B';
SELECT assessment_id, data_subject, risk_assessment FROM privacy_impact_assessments ORDER BY assessment_id LIMIT 3;
SELECT data_controller, COUNT(assessment_id) AS assessments_count FROM privacy_impact_assessments GROUP BY data_controller ORDER BY assessments_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM privacy_impact_assessments;
SELECT assessment_name, assessment_date FROM privacy_impact_assessments ORDER BY assessment_date;
SELECT * FROM data_processing_activities WHERE activity_type = 'Data Collection';
SELECT activity_id, activity_name, activity_type FROM data_processing_activities ORDER BY activity_name ASC;
SELECT assessment_id, assessment_name, to_char(assessment_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS formatted_date FROM privacy_impact_assessments;
SELECT * FROM privacy_impact_assessments;
SELECT assessment_name, assessment_date FROM privacy_impact_assessments WHERE assessment_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT assessment_id, assessment_name FROM privacy_impact_assessments ORDER BY assessment_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM data_processing_activities WHERE activity_type LIKE '%processing%';
SELECT activity_id, activity_name FROM data_processing_activities WHERE activity_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY activity_name;
SELECT * FROM privacy_impact_assessment;
SELECT assessment_performed_by, data_elements_impacted FROM privacy_impact_assessment WHERE assessment_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM data_processing_activities ORDER BY activity_name DESC;
SELECT data_category, data_storage_location FROM data_processing_activities WHERE activity_id = 10;
SELECT risk_level, risk_description FROM risk_evaluation WHERE assessment_id = 5 AND activity_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM privacy_impact_assessment;
SELECT id, assessment_date, assessment_performed_by FROM privacy_impact_assessment WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM privacy_impact_assessment ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT assessment_performed_by, data_elements_impacted FROM privacy_impact_assessment WHERE assessment_performed_by LIKE '%John%';
SELECT risk_level, risk_description FROM risk_evaluation WHERE risk_level = 'High';
SELECT * FROM privacy_impact_assessment;
SELECT assessment_date, data_subject, data_controller FROM privacy_impact_assessment;
SELECT id, data_subject, assessment_summary FROM privacy_impact_assessment WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM data_processing_activity WHERE location = 'EU';
SELECT activity_name, purpose, location FROM data_processing_activity ORDER BY activity_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM privacy_impact_assessment;
SELECT assessment_date, data_subject FROM privacy_impact_assessment WHERE data_controller='CompanyA';
SELECT assessment_summary, assessment_date FROM privacy_impact_assessment WHERE id=3;
SELECT id, risk_category, risk_level FROM risk_evaluation ORDER BY risk_level DESC;
SELECT reviewer_name, review_date, review_comments FROM assessment_review WHERE review_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM privacy_impact_assessment;
SELECT id, data_processing_activity FROM privacy_impact_assessment;
SELECT data_risk_evaluation, data_privacy_implications FROM privacy_impact_assessment;
SELECT * FROM data_processing_activities WHERE id = 1;
SELECT activity_description, activity_name FROM data_processing_activities;
SELECT * FROM privacy_impact_assessment;
SELECT data_processing_activity, data_risk_evaluation FROM privacy_impact_assessment WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM data_processing_activities ORDER BY activity_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM data_risks WHERE risk_name LIKE '%security%';
SELECT id, assessment_date, assessment_outcome FROM assessment_results WHERE assessment_outcome = 'High';
